ygData.subject: Re: Necro Spells..?
ygData.msgSnippet: I typed www.eqlizer.com and there no sight. Can you give that sight agian? thanks ... From: Juan Custer  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I typed www.eqlizer.com and there no sight. Can you give that sight agian?
thanks
-----Original Message-----
From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 2:39 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Necro Spells..?


>From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
>
>
> Just go to EQ'Lizer or EQ Stratics for a better list. The list at
>EQ'Lizer is very filled up and seems to be the best version so far. Note
>that Corpse Bomb is not in the game and the Grim Aura merely adds 10 to
your
>ATK or something.
>
>Malark, Karana
>
